marketing: Shell Gadus S3  U220A  1 is  part of Shellâ€™s comprehensive range of multi-purpose greases for industrial and general purpose bearings applications. The product offers excellent performance in normal speed applications that experience sustained heavy loads and elevated temperatures. The product provides excellent corrosion protection, mechanical stability and oxidative resistance, making it well suited for applications where long grease life and water resistance in the presence of elevated operational temperatures is necessary.
